Platform / Add New Model

Add a new 3d model

Click on the + Add new model button in the top right corner of the screen to add a new 3d model to your dashboard.

You then have the choice to:

  • Order a new 3d model directly from Archilogic
  • Upload your own custom 3d content or use the Archilogic 3d editor to build your own model.
    This option is available with an Archilogic Professional subscription.

Based on the documentation template by Bootstrap team, generated with a fork of Jekyll Bootstrap Doc.
